title: What Are the Lucky Colors for a Taurus?

steps.title: Green
steps.content: Green The best color for a Taurus? Green! As an earth element, Taurus is known for their grounding energy and connection with nature. Green is also a universal symbol for growth, embodying a Taurus’s determined and reliable energy. [1] X Research source If you’re a Taurus, earthy emerald and forest greens are the best colors for you. [2] X Research source Green also symbolizes wealth, and Taureans are known for their financial prowess and affinity for material possessions.

steps.title: Pink
steps.content: Pink The color pink speaks to a Taurus’s true self. Ruled by Venus, the planet of love, pink evokes a Taurus’s compassionate heart and loving nature. [3] X Research source Pink symbolizes love and romance, making it an excellent color to represent the hopeless romantic within the strong-willed Taurus. [4] X Research source So, if you’re a Taurus and feeling spicy, try wearing pink or drinking a pink drink to fuel your spiritual energy.

steps.title: Black
steps.content: Black Black is symbolic of a Taurus’s strength. If you’re a Taurus, you’re likely strong, dominant, and extremely independent—you’re a natural-born leader with a strong head on your shoulders. The bull is your symbol, and rightfully so! Like you, black is a dominant color that’s extremely resilient. [5] X Research source Black is considered a protective color. [6] X Research source If you’re a Taurus, you’re also probably extremely protective of your loved ones—you’re likely the parent of your friend group.

steps.title: White
steps.content: White White brings a Taurus peace. You may be oddly attracted to whites and creams as a Taurus. Why? Because these colors balance your heightened emotions. [7] X Research source It’s likely easy for you to become hotheaded, and you can be pretty stubborn. [8] X Research source So, surrounding yourself with the color white is an easy way to balance your energy and purify your mind of negative or distracting thoughts.

steps.title: Red
steps.content: Red As a Taurus, you likely have strong emotions, even if you hide them well. Because of this, bold, fiery reds can set you off balance. Red is a dominant color that demands attention, and this boldness can offset your caring nature and make you even more stubborn. [9] X Research source Although Taureans have a romantic and seductive side, red is too erotically bold to represent this zodiac sign.

steps.title: Yellow
steps.content: Yellow Despite its joyful tone, yellow could upset a grounded, reliable Taurus. This bright color may distract you from what needs your attention most, causing you to grow irritated or lose focus. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Balance your space with white.
steps.content: Balance your space with white. White walls and decor help invigorate a Taurus’s imagination and stabilize their emotions. If you’re a Taurus, cleanse your mind and spirit by painting the walls of your living room or bedroom white. Opt for white cabinets in the kitchen, or even add a white shaggy rug to a hallway. These white tones can bring you peace of mind and create a welcoming environment.

steps.title: Add green accents to create a calming atmosphere.
steps.content: Add green accents to create a calming atmosphere. Green decor is a great way to bring nature’s grounding energy into your home. If you’re a Taurus, decorate your space with green pillows or blankets, green paintings, or green foliage. This can help you feel more relaxed and centered.

steps.title: Wear pink to attract love and boost your confidence.
steps.content: Wear pink to attract love and boost your confidence. Pink clothes empower a Taurus to be their true self. As a Taurus, if you’re in need of a little self-love or romance, put on a pink shirt, dress, or accessory. Wearing any shade of pink is an excellent way to tap into your potential and attractive energy.

steps.title: Embody your strength with black clothing.
steps.content: Embody your strength with black clothing. Black is a Taurus’s symbol of power and independence. If you’re a Taurus, wear black to give yourself an extra boost of faith. The color can remind you of your leadership potential, helping you thrive in practically any situation. Opt for black skinny jeans for extra confidence, or throw on a black hoodie for comfort.

steps.title: Gemstones: Emerald, rose quartz, and sapphire
steps.content: Gemstones: Emerald, rose quartz, and sapphire Crystals of the Taurus’s birthstones (such as emerald, rose quartz, and sapphire) are considered the most lucky for this zodiac sign. If you’re a Taurus, keep one of these gemstones on your person for extra luck throughout the day, or decorate your space with them. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Numbers: 1, 2, 5, 6, and 9
steps.content: Numbers: 1, 2, 5, 6, and 9 A Taurus may find prosperity and good fortune in the numbers 1, 2, 5, 6, and 9. [12] X Research source If you're a Taurus, you might see these numbers more frequently than others as they’re called to your energy. Try using these numbers to pick sports jerseys, lottery tickets, and so on to enhance your luck.
